headline: Is Booking (BKNG) Using Gig-Tripping To Quietly Prove Its Connected Trip Strategy?
summary: In early December 2025, viagogo announced a partnership with Booking.com that lets fans booking tickets instantly add nearby hotels, flights, car rentals, and local attractions, tapping into the growing global “gig-tripping” trend. This collaboration links event ticketing directly with Booking Holdings’ Connected Trip ambitions, potentially deepening customer engagement by turning one-off gigs into full-trip itineraries booked on its platforms. Next, we’ll examine how this event-led travel...

headline: Is It Too Late To Consider Booking After Its Massive Multi Year Share Price Surge?
summary: Wondering if Booking Holdings is still a smart buy after its massive run up, or if most of the value has already been priced in? Let us walk through what the numbers are really saying about the stock today. After a strong multi year climb, Booking is now trading around $5,197, with returns of 5.7% over the last week, 5.8% over the last month, and 5.5% year to date, even though the 1 year return is a slightly negative 1.2% against a 161.5% gain over 3 years and 152.8% over 5 years. Recent...
